sources.title: 1966 - Massacre Time - Nothing in common but HATE...and nothing to lose but LIFE!
sources.description:
Prospector Tom Corbett storms back to his hometown, now tyrannized by the sadistic Scott family, and teams up with his whiskey-soaked sharpshooter brother Jeff. They unleash lead-filled justice on whip-cracking madman Junior Scott and his goons in a wild, explosive showdown.

Original title: Le colt cantarono la morte e fu... tempo di massacro (1966)
Alternative title: The Brute and the Beast / Massacre Time

Director: Lucio Fulci
Writers: Fernando Di Leo, Lucio Fulci, Enzo Dell'Aquila

Main cast:
Franco Nero - Tom Corbett
George Hilton - Jeff Corbett
Linda Sini - Brady
Giuseppe Addobbati - Mr. Scott
Nino Castelnuovo - Jason "Junior" Scott
Tom Felleghy - Murray

Genres: Western, Action, Drama, Thriller
Release date: August 10, 1966 (Italy)

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: In 1866 New Mexico, Tom Corbett is a prospector who is called back to his hometown in Laramie Town, Texas at the bequest of a old family friend. Tom arrives in the town to see it under the control of a ruthless and greedy gangster named Jason Scott, who's psychotic and murder-crazed son, Junior Scott, runs it with fear with a posse of thugs who kill anyone who protests their business tactics. Tom finds his brother Jeff, a drunkard looked after by their family maid Mercedes. Tom then tries to persuade Jeff to help him take down the sadistic Scotts so the town can rest easy in peace and harmony again.
metadata.Writer: Fernando Di Leo, Lucio Fulci, Enzo Dell'Aquila
metadata.Actors: Franco Nero, George Hilton, Linda Sini
